LanguageData.MakePlastic.label: Create plastic
LanguageData.MakeRubber.label: Create rubber
LanguageData.MakeRubber.description: Create rubber from polymers and sulphates. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeRubber.jobString: Creating rubber from polymers and sulphates.
LanguageData.VulcanizeRubber.label: Vulcanize rubber
LanguageData.VulcanizeRubber.description: Vulcanize rubber from caoutchouc and sulphates. Produces 10.
LanguageData.VulcanizeRubber.jobString: Vulcanizing rubber from caoutchouc and sulphates.
LanguageData.MakeSyntheticFibers.label: Create synthetic fibers
LanguageData.MakeSyntheticFibers.description: Create synthetic fibers from polymers and sulphates. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeCompaste.label: Craft compound paste
LanguageData.MakeCompaste.description: Craft bottles of compound paste, used in a wide variety of clothing. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeCarbon.label: Create carbon
LanguageData.MakeCarbon.description: Create carbon from polymers, rubber and coal ore. Produces 12.
LanguageData.Make_ChemfuelFromWood.label: make chemfuel from wood
LanguageData.Make_ChemfuelFromWood.description: Make a batch of chemfuel by extracting and condensing wood gas from logs.
LanguageData.Make_ChemfuelFromOrganics.label: make chemfuel from organics
LanguageData.Make_ChemfuelFromOrganics.description: Make a batch of chemfuel by extracting biofuel from organic feedstocks.
